unnormalised: Regarding the debate on the exact date of the Battle of Haldighati, historical records vary. While many sources cite 18/06/1576 as the battle's commencement, some accounts propose 21st June, 1576. Further research into contemporary Persian chronicles and Rajasthani accounts is necessary for definitive confirmation. Regardless, the year 1576 remains undisputed, marking a pivotal moment in Rajput resistance against the Mughal Empire. The interpretations and implications of this event on Indian history continue to be studied and debated by historians till date.
normalised: Regarding the debate on the exact date of the Battle of Haldighati, historical records vary. While many sources cite eighteenth june fifteen seventy six as the battle's commencement, some accounts propose twenty first June, fifteen seventy six. Further research into contemporary Persian chronicles and Rajasthani accounts is necessary for definitive confirmation. Regardless, the year fifteen seventy six remains undisputed, marking a pivotal moment in Rajput resistance against the Mughal Empire. The interpretations and implications of this event on Indian history continue to be studied and debated by historians till date.
